TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to run Cross Tab report.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click tab 'ATTRIBUTES'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click tab 'ATTRIBUTES'.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click tab 'ATTRIBUTES'.
